attributes.action: Ask the people if this is what they believed they were voting for
attributes.additional_details:
There are only two successes which can be attributed to our present government:

1.  they have continued to exponentially raise the cost of governemnt, and,

2.  they have continued to increase the funding of worldwide terrorism through their refusal to stop our foreign aid programme.

It is unconchable that the british electorate had in mind what is now going on in our government when they voted at the last general election and they MUST be given an opportunity to stop these HIDEOUS activities, which our politicians lack the moral fortutide to do on our behalf, through the holding of an immediate general election.
